titleStmt.title: William T. Pratt to Ephraim L. Van Winkle
CWG1067

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Governor's Official Correspondence File, Requisitions for the Return of Fugitives from Justice, 1863-1867

body.p: Enclosed find Requisition on his Excellency for the Return of Thos Fitzmaurice a fugitive from Justice from this state,
Please obtain the necessary order for his arrest and forward to me at Fortwayne Indiana by Express -- Please attend to this at once and oblige
Enclosed find $1.00 should the fees be more please send amount & I shall forward to you at once
